content.p: The University of Nottingham prides itself on its unique International Curriculum which we believe truly enhances the student experience. TMany students are participating in our inter-campus exchange programmes that offer an exciting range of Summer School programmes all of which have an international element; be it through language learning or courses with a special focus on Asian travel, business or culture. The Malaysia campus also plays a leading role in the development, strategy and implementation of the International curriculum as the International working group is lead by Vice-Provost for Teaching and Learning. We produce corporate publications to provide information and updates on the University. Visit the Malaysia campus International Office for more information about our exchanges, Summer Schools and more Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia THE UNIVERSITY OF NOTTINGHAM IN MALAYSIA SDN. BHD. DULN001(B) (473520-K) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
